name: Ace Car Tycoon
description:
As an Ace Car Tycoon, you need to be able to buy cars, repair cars, sell cars, of course refit cars, and sometimes participate in car races to increase your popularity.

Game Features:
-Car repair
Experience the vehicle repair process where car cleaning, vehicle repair, paint job picking, dent repair will be a permanent item on your to-do list

-Used car business
Choose used vehicles, after your repair craftsmanship, sell them on the market for a profit

-Car modification and racing
Modify the car according to your style and go to the race, prove that you are the racing master

-Car shop story
In your vehicle repair shop, you will meet a variety of customers, they have many needs and many stories
